caption: Two men and an elderly woman, all dressed in black, are in a house. One of the men seems mentally unstable, and the other two appear very concerned. At that moment, a doctor wearing a white coat approaches. The doctor is a woman, and she conducts some tests on them. She determines that the man's condition is quite dire, and they decide to send him to an ambulance. Elsewhere, a commercial is being aired featuring a man with a very arrogant expression. Subsequently, the mentally unstable man is admitted to the hospital.
